channel.title: SWS:SE Hit the Sith - Save the Galaxy
channel.description: This one-shot is based on 'Hit the Street - Defend the Block' (or more precisely my drift of Rich's game to Pulp Archetypes, Hit the Nazi - Retrieve the Ark). This is set in the early years of the Rebellion against the Empire as portrayed in the first SW Movie - the real first one - not the prequels. ![Hit the Sith Cover|375x500](upload://2fcSnniQ708BeuWCOb4gJSz5e2j.jpeg) Sat 4 December 2021 at 2pm (GMT): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MltmjWR89_GJPCG2pCL Join us as we prove that there were plenty of other Heroes who didn't get as much credit as Leia, Luke and Han ...

item.title: SWS:SE Hit the Sith - Save the Galaxy
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

This one-shot is based on ‘Hit the Street - Defend the Block’ (or more precisely my drift of Rich’s game to Pulp Archetypes, Hit the Nazi - Retrieve the Ark). This is set in the early years of the Rebellion against the Empire as portrayed in the first SW Movie - the real first one - not the prequels.

Hit the Sith Cover1441×1918 1.1 MB

Sat 4 December 2021 at 2pm (GMT): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MltmjWR89_GJPCG2pCL
Join us as we prove that there were plenty of other Heroes who didn’t get as much credit as Leia, Luke and Han …
